channel.title: iDigital
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from iDigital, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: GPT-4.5 for enterprise: Do its accuracy and knowledge justify the cost?
item.description: The price of GPT-4.5 is very steep. But it doesn't mean that it's a failure (or that it will always be so expensive).

item.title: Weak cyber defenses are exposing critical infrastructure — how enterprises can proactively thwart cunning attackers to protect us all
item.description: If businesses fail to up their cybersecurity game, the systems everyone relies on could face serious and devastating disruptions.

item.title: A dear friend, 91, wants to add me to the deed of his house. His daughter died and he’s not close to his son. Is that a good idea?
item.description: “What is the best way to add my name, so there are no issues upon his death?”

item.title: The economy’s at risk of plunging into an air pocket, says JPMorgan. What that would mean for stocks now and in the future.
item.description: Investors are brushing aside the possibilities of more turbulence to come for the U.S. economy and potential fallout for markets, warns JPMorgan.
